casebody.data:
CITY OF ASHEVILLE
v.
STATE of North Carolina, et al. No. 391P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 25, 2015.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of November 2015 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of November 2015."
